paragraphs: In Prague, an evening of memory of Vladimir Vysotsky titled "I will definitely come back" will take place. The best songs of the author, performed with a guitar and live accompaniment of the string orchestra Czech Live Symphony Orchestra, will sound on the stage of the Divadlo na Maninach theater.
The concert will take place on Friday, October 31st. It starts at 7:30 PM.
👉 Tickets can be purchased through this link.

"The concert is inspired by the studio recordings of Vladimir Vysotsky from 1974-1975 accompanied by the ensemble 'Melodiya' under the direction of Georgy Garanyan. The sincere musicality and deep immersion into the atmosphere of the artist's creativity will transport the audience into the world he has created," the event description says.
